note.p: Education: Heidelberg; MD (1673); Paris; London; Oxford

Career: Town Physician of Limburg an der Lahn; Personal Physician to Princess Albertine of Nassau and the Princes of Nassau and Dietz; Town Physician of Hanau am Main (1682); Personal Physician to the Landgrave of Hessen-Kassel
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; DBE; Hirsch

Notes: Proposed by Frederick Slare. Alternative spelling comes from Hunter, who also supplies the election date - index to BR and R only give the year - or rather the date his election was approved. Hunter offers 1651 as the year of his birth.
